plot: She has been saying no for a while, he keeps trying. She promises him that tonight will be very special, and she couldn't be more right, tonight will be a very special night.
title: Señor X
plot_es: She has been saying no for a while, he keeps trying. She promises him that tonight will be very special, and she couldn't be more right, tonight will be a very special night.
plot_en: She has been saying no for a while, he keeps trying. She promises him that tonight will be very special, and she couldn't be more right, tonight will be a very special night.
